t: r/SeattleWA on Reddit: Amazon Go store closed in downtown Seattle

t: Brand Stores: Create a brand page on Amazon for free | Amazon Ads
s: Brand Stores help build brand awareness by showcasing your brand and product catalog on your own Amazon web address. You can create a Brand Store at no additional cost—with no coding necessary.

t: Amazon launches first Just Walk Out technology store at an Amazon office in Canada (Photos)
s: September 5, 2024 - Amazon expands its Canadian presence by introducing Just Walk Out technology stores in its Toronto offices, unveiling a new atrium at its Vancouver Tech Hub, and announcing office expansions in both cities.

t: Amazon Downtown Jobs, Employment in Seattle, WA | Indeed.com

1 day ago - Amazon sells many products under its own brand names, including phone chargers, batteries, and diaper wipes. The AmazonBasics brand was introduced in 2009, and now features hundreds of product lines, including smartphone cases, computer mice, batteries, dumbbells, and dog crates.

November 26, 2024 - Amazon offers multiple lines of privately labeled products. These are available on Amazon.com, Amazon Fresh, Prime Pantry, Prime Now, Amazon Go, and Whole Foods Market. Amazon houses its in-house brand offerings under the “Our Brands” label, which is separate from exclusive brands.

t: Amazon Seattle Downtown Main Campus and Buildings
s: There are 46 buildings at the Amazon Seattle Downtown Main Campus.

2 weeks ago - Amazon's global headquarters are in more than 40 owned and leased buildings spread across Seattle's adjacent South Lake Union, Denny Triangle, and Downtown neighborhoods. The first 14 buildings Amazon occupied in South Lake Union were developed primarily by Vulcan, Inc.

t: Amazon to Open First-Ever Fashion Store "Amazon Style" at the Americana at Brand | Downtown Glendale
s: February 21, 2022 - Downtown Glendale City Guide | Glendale, California ... Glendale has long been a top shopping destination, serving as a testing ground for a number of “first-of-their-kind” retail concepts. Glendale’s combination of a diverse population and affluent shoppers is the ideal location for Amazon to open its first-ever Amazon Style fashion store at the Americana at Brand...
